messages.title: Let's make Cheltenham a better place to live
messages.content: Martin Horwood talks about his commitment to making a real change in Cheltenham, focusing on local voice and accountability.

messages.title: Martin fights for our local NHS
messages.content: Martin Horwood has been actively involved in fighting for the NHS and protecting local health services from cuts.

messages.title: Labour has failed us all
messages.content: The leaflet criticizes the Labour Party's time in government, citing failures to provide essential services and the need for change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems will cut your tax bill, advocating for fairer taxes so millionaires pay more and the majority pays less.
A pledge to invest in schools and smaller class sizes, focusing on quality education.
A commitment to fight against NHS cuts and closures, ensuring the protection of local health services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet describes Cheltenham as a two-horse race between Martin Horwood and the Conservative candidate, indicating tactical voting considerations.

issues.economy: The leaflet discusses the failure of the Labour Party to handle the economy effectively and the promise of the Lib Dems to offer a change that works for the majority.
issues.education: Promises to invest in education, including smaller class sizes and ensuring every child gets a fair start.
issues.environment: The leaflet outlines the Lib Dems' efforts to increase recycling and mentions Martin Horwood's Green Belt protection efforts.
issues.governance: Martin Horwood emphasizes local governance, reflecting his efforts to listen to the community and make Cheltenham's voice heard.
issues.health: Martin Horwood has shown a commitment to fighting against NHS cuts and prioritizes local health services, as highlighted in the leaflet.

housing.content: The leaflet states that Lib Dems will scrap unfair housing targets, focusing on the needs of local communities.

leaflet.personalStatement: Martin Horwood states he will continue to put local people first and work to deliver real change for Cheltenham residents.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fighting for local NHS, against unfair housing targets, and for better local transport. Published the book 'Clearing the Air' about his work on the local hospital and for the environment.

quotes.text: We need fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket!
I'll invest in our schools so children get a fair chance

images.caption: Martin Horwood and local community members campaigning.
Martin Horwood with Nick Clegg and Vince Cable discussing tax policies.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet repeatedly emphasizes the choice between Martin Horwood and the Conservative candidate, implying a strong tactical voting consideration in Cheltenham. It also includes a section to fill in personal details to support the campaign.
